achievements.title: Why Did It Have to Be Snakes?
Watch Them Unravel
achievements.text: Complete all four act decks during a single playthrough of “Threads of Fate.”

achievements.title: Hope for Humanity
achievements.text: Restore Ichtaca’s faith in humanity in “The Boundary Beyond.”

achievements.title: Beyond Perfection:
achievements.text: Complete all eight tasks on act 2 of “The City of Archives” during a single playthrough.

achievements.title: I Remember Everything
achievements.text: Restore Alejandro’s memories in “The City of Archives.”

achievements.title: Patricide
achievements.text: Defeat Yig in “The Depths of Yoth.”

achievements.title: I’ve Built Up An Immunity
achievements.text: Win The Forgotten Age campaign without ever becoming poisoned.

achievements.title: We Have an Understanding
achievements.text: Win The Forgotten Age campaign without ever dealing any damage to the Harbinger of Valusia.

achievements.title: Who Needs Any of This Junk?
achievements.text: Win The Forgotten Age campaign without purchasing any supplies.

achievements.title: Don’t Tread on Me
achievements.text: Win The Forgotten Age campaign with no tally marks recorded under Yig’s Fury in your Campaign Log

achievements.title: Bane of Yig
achievements.text: Win The Forgotten Age campaign with 25+ tally marks recorded under Yig’s Fury in your Campaign Log.

achievements.title: If I Could Turn Back Time
achievements.text: Forge your own path, unlock Scenario IX, and win The Forgotten Age campaign.

achievements.title: Yoth Expertise
achievements.text: Win The Forgotten Age campaign on Expert difficulty
